hadiths.text: Narrated Anas: "When the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) entered the area in which he would relieve himself, he would remove the ring." [Abu 'Eisa said:] This Hadith is Hasan Sahih Gharib Hadith

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي لُبْسِ الْخَاتَمِ فِي الْيَمِينِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Wearing The Ring On The Right Hand
